description: The COVERAGE_2 table contains high-level information on both managed care and indemnity coverage records in your system.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the status for this coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: IS_DEDUCT_MET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the deductible has been met for this coverage. The deductible can be established on the guarantor account or patient level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Deductible Met


Not Met

columns.name: IS_ASGN_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicated whether the provider's assignment status is set to Coverage Assignment for this coverage's payor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accept Assignment


Do Not Accept Assignment

columns.name: SIG_ON_FILE_DATE
columns.description: The date when the signature was filed.

columns.name: SIG_ON_FILE_LOC
columns.description: The location at which the signature was filed.

columns.name: MEDIGAP_AUTH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the payor for this coverage has Medigap authorization.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: TPL_RESOURCE_CODE
columns.description: This column lists the Third Party Liability resource code for a specific plan. This code is either returned in the real-time eligibility response or found on the patient's insurance card.

columns.name: THIRD_PARTY_LIAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there is third-party liability for this coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEDIGAP_AUTH_YN

columns.name: BENEFIT_CODE
columns.description: The benefit code for this coverage. This can contain any facility-specific benefit code.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_DISCON_DT
columns.description: The date when the coverage is scheduled to be discontinued.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_ACTV_DT
columns.description: The date when the coverage is scheduled to be activated.

columns.name: YR_ALLOW_DOL_TOT
columns.description: The yearly dollar limit for payments against this coverage's payor.

columns.name: YR_ALLOW_DOL_USE
columns.description: The year-to-date payments made against the coverage's payor.

columns.name: ORG_FOR_CLM_SUBMIT
columns.description: The title or name of the organization to which submitted claims under this coverage will be sent.

columns.name: FINANCIAL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The financial class for this coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Commercial


Medicare


Medicaid


Self-Pay


Worker's Comp


Tricare


Champva


Group Health Plan


FECA Black Lung


Blue Shield


Medigap


Other


DK Regional


Client

columns.name: COVERAGE_FAX
columns.description: The fax number for this coverage.

columns.name: FREE_TXT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The free-text plan name for this coverage.

columns.name: FREE_TXT_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The free-text payor name for this coverage.

columns.name: PLAN_FREE_TEXT
columns.description: The format of the coverage's free-text plan.

columns.name: TEFRA_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is TEFRA. A patient is TEFRA if an eligible Medicare beneficiary is covered by a group health plan.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEDIGAP_AUTH_YN

columns.name: ADMISSION_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the admission source.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Physician Referral


Clinic Referral


HMO Referral


Transfer from Hospital


Transfer from a SNF


Transfer from other Health Care Facility


Emergency Room


Court/Law Enforcement

columns.name: ENROLL_CODE_FBC
columns.description: The Federal Employment Program enrollment code.

columns.name: GRP_NUMBER
columns.description: The group number for the coverage.

columns.name: HMO_SITE_NUM
columns.description: The site number for the coverage's HMO.

columns.name: HMO_SITE_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number for the coverage's HMO.

columns.name: COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The copay amount for the coverage.

columns.name: CHAMP_SPON_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The CHAMPUS/Tricare sponsor's military status, obtained from the military identification card.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active Military


Retired Military


Deceased

columns.name: SERVICE_BRANCH
columns.description: The military service branch for a CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage subscriber.

columns.name: CHAMP_SPON_BRANCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
A CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage sponsor's military service branch.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Army


Air Force


Marines


Navy


Coast Guard


Public Health Service


NOAA (National Oceanic & Atmospheric Adm.)

columns.name: CHAMP_SPON_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
A CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage sponsor's military pay grade.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


G1 Commissioned


09 Commissioned


08 Commissioned


07 Commissioned


06 Commissioned


05 Commissioned


04 Commissioned


03 Commissioned


02 Commissioned


01 Commissioned


W4 Warrant


W3 Warrant


W2 Warrant


W1 Warrant


E9 Enlisted


E8 Enlisted


E7 Enlisted


E6 Enlisted


E5 Enlisted


E4 Enlisted


E3 Enlisted


E2 Enlisted


E1 Enlisted


Security


NATO


CHAMPVA

columns.name: MCARE_OTHER_INS_CO
columns.description: An additional insurance company providing coverage for a Medicare patient.

columns.name: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a Medicare patient is receiving disability benefit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


YES


NO

columns.name: DIS_CVD_BY_EMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a Medicare patient is receiving disability coverage from their employer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_100_EMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a Medicare employer has over 100 employees.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_AUTO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the illness or injury for this visit is due to an automobile accident.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_LIAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the illness or injury for this visit is due to a liability accident.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_WK_COMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a Medicare visit is covered by Workman's Compensation.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_NON_AUTO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient's visit is due to an accident not involving automobiles.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_BLACK_LUNG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the illness is covered by the Black Lung program.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_VA_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the illness is covered by a Veterans' Administration program.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_PARENT_EMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient's parents or guardians are employed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_CVD_GD_YN
columns.description:
For large group health plans, indicates if the patient is covered by their parent or guardian.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_GD_EMP_100_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the employer of this patient's parent or guardian employs over 100 people.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: IS_MCARE_VET_ADMN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether this coverage is for a Veterans' Administration program.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


UNKNOWN

columns.name: MCARE_EMPLOYED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Medicare patient is employed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_ENRL_HMO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the Medicare patient is enrolled in an HMO.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_CVD_EGHP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is covered by an employer group health plan.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_EMP_20_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Medicare patient is employed by an employer with over 20 employees.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_REN_DIAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a renal dialysis patient in the first 12 months of entitlement.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: IS_MCARE_RENAL_DI_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a renal dialysis patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_MCARE_VET_ADMN_C_NAME

columns.name: MCARE_1ST_18MO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is in the first 18 months of entitlement for renal dialysis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_HOME_DIAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a home dialysis patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_SELF_EPO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this patient self-administers EPO.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_DISABLE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient's Medicare coverage is due to disability.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_SPSE_RET_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse is retired.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_SPOUSE_RET_DT
columns.description: The date when a Medicare patient's spouse retired.

columns.name: MCARE_EMPR_INS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient is insured by their employer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_RETIRE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient is retired.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_RETIRE_DATE
columns.description: The date when a Medicare patient retired.

columns.name: MCARE_FAM_EMPY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse or another family member is employed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_OTHR_CVG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient is covered because of their spouse or other family member.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_SPC_EMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse is employed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: MCARE_CVG_FRM_SP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Medicare patient is covered through their spouse's employer group health plan.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MCARE_REC_DIS_YN

columns.name: VERIF_EVS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if verification is done through Eligibility Verification Systems (EVS).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEDIGAP_AUTH_YN

columns.name: EVS_VERIF_DATE
columns.description: The date when eligibility was verified with Eligibility Verification Systems (EVS).

columns.name: PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The coverage payor's name.

columns.name: PAYOR_CITY
columns.description: The coverage payor's city.
